site.title: When is Wednesday?
site.description: A handy web app to determine when the next Wednesday is.
landing.header.leader: Are you sick of showing up to karaoke on the wrong day?
landing.header.title: When is Wednesday?
landing.date.title: Select your date
landing.date.description: Use the tool below to choose a date, and our special, amazing algorithm will determine the next wednesday!
landing.testimonials.title: Testimonials
landing.testimonials.description: Check out all of the testimonials from our satisfied users! If you are wrong about dates, then When is Wednesday will save your life!
footer.createdBy: This site was made by Malcolm
